medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.summary: A pain reliever that also reduces swelling and fever.
medicines.use: Used for headaches, muscle pain, toothaches, and fever relief.

medicines.name: Acetaminophen (Tylenol)
medicines.summary: A pain reliever and fever reducer that is gentle on the stomach.
medicines.use: Used for mild to moderate pain like headaches, colds, and fever.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.summary: An antibiotic that fights bacterial infections.
medicines.use: Used to treat infections like ear infections, pneumonia, and strep throat.

medicines.name: Loratadine (Claritin)
medicines.summary: An antihistamine that helps with allergies.
medicines.use: Used for relief from sneezing, runny nose, and itchy eyes caused by allergies.

medicines.name: Omeprazole
medicines.summary: Reduces stomach acid to help with heartburn and ulcers.
medicines.use: Used to treat acid reflux, GERD, and stomach ulcers.

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.summary: Helps control blood sugar levels in people with diabetes.

medicines.name: Simvastatin
medicines.summary: Lowers bad cholesterol and raises good cholesterol.
medicines.use: Used to reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke.

medicines.name: Albuterol
medicines.summary: A medication that helps open airways for easier breathing.
medicines.use: Used to treat asthma and breathing problems like COPD.

medicines.name: Diphenhydramine (Benadryl)
medicines.summary: An antihistamine that helps with allergies and sleep.
medicines.use: Used for allergy relief, colds, and as a sleep aid.

medicines.name: Hydrochlorothiazide
medicines.summary: A water pill that helps remove excess salt and water from the body.
medicines.use: Used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.
